translation.en: Aren't you a little old to be playing with dolls, Michael?
translation.ja: いい年して人形遊びか

translation.en: What do you think, Billy? Is my kid gonna love this thing, or what?
Sure, he'll love it. He looks just like it.
translation.ja: 喜ぶぞ　お前にソックリだ

translation.en: Yeah, he is pretty cute, isn't he?
translation.ja: かわいいって意味だろ？

translation.en: Do you know what day it is?
Tuesday.
It's October 1st. It was exactly ten years ago till I first came to America.
translation.ja: 実は10年前の今日 俺はアメリカに来たんだ

translation.en: No shit. Hey, happy anniversary, Billy.
translation.ja: ビリー　記念日じゃないか

translation.en: I'll tell you what. Ten years deserves a celebration. How about I take you out for a drink after work? Come on.
translation.ja: 祝ってやるよ 一杯やりに行こう

translation.en: I can't be too late, I'm meeting a girl at nine.
translation.ja: 悪いが今夜は先約がある

translation.en: She wants to help me celebrate, too.
If you could party after the graveyard shift. You got a lot of stamina.
translation.ja: 仕事でクタクタなのに もう一戦 交えるつもりか

translation.en: You know what I mean?
Shit. Look like the fucking Indians got another one. We better check it out, Billy.
translation.ja: ゴロツキが暴れてる 見てこよう

translation.en: This is car 17 to dispatch. We got a Code 10- 22.
translation.ja: こちらセクターＨ付近の 17号車

translation.en: Stripped truck, Sector H, right off Longfellow Avenue. We'll get right back to you.
translation.ja: トラックが襲撃されたもよう 詳細は追って連絡する

translation.en: Careful, Billy.
Michael, check it out.
Jesus!
Christ, don't... don't shoot me.
Take anything you want, just don't shoot me.
translation.ja: 荷物は全部 持っていっていい

translation.en: Relax.
We're cops, okay?
You fellas got one hell of a friendly city here, you know that?
translation.ja: 赤信号で止まったら このザマだ

translation.en: Just stopped for a red light and boom.
translation.ja: なんて物騒な町なんだ

translation.en: Oh, they got my computers!
translation.ja: コンピューターが盗まれた

translation.en: Oh, look at my rig! My poor rig!
translation.ja: 商売道具のトラックも イカれちまった

translation.en: You stopped at a red light in the South Bronx with a truckload of computers?
translation.ja: サウスブロンクスでは よくあることだ

translation.en: Where you from, pal?
Texas.
Figures.
Welcome to New York.
translation.ja: Ｎ.Ｙ.(ニューヨーク)へようこそ

translation.en: Hey. You're not taking that in, are you?
translation.ja: それも持っていく気か？

translation.en: Can't leave it in the car, someone will steal it. Don't give me a hard time. Get in there.
translation.ja: 置いといたら 盗まれちまうだろ

translation.en: Hey, that's enough, huh?
Come on, let's go! Let's do it!
Okay, I'm going to kick some fucking ass!
I'm gonna hit the can.
Another round for my two friends.
You got it.
All right, big man. Close that door!
- - Nobody move!
- Michael, get the back door! - Okay!
All right, everybody over here. Get over to that jukebox!
translation.ja: 全員 ジュークボックスの そばへ移動しろ

translation.en: Let's go! Move! Move!
translation.ja: 全員 ジュークボックスの そばへ移動しろ 早く行け

translation.en: All right. I wanna see rings, watches, wallets.
translation.ja: 財布と金目のものは 全部 出せ

translation.en: Let's go! You, get over there!
translation.ja: 急げ　グズグズするな

translation.en: Hurry up! Hurry up!
translation.ja: 急げ　グズグズするな 急げ

translation.en: Hey, that means you, too, bozo! Let's go!
Come on! I said right now!
translation.ja: 早く言うとおりにしろ

translation.en: Hey, open that register real quick.
- Before I blow your fucking head off! -
- Take it easy. I'll open it. - Hey, bozo.
translation.ja: 撃たないで いい加減にしろ

translation.en: Hurry up!
I want it!
Hey, man, it's not mine. It's not mine.
translation.ja: 誰に聞いてる？ 俺のじゃねえよ

translation.en: Come on, boy. You're coming with me.
All right, big man.
Hey! What are you looking at?
translation.ja: てめえ　何見てんだ

translation.en: I'll be out in a minute.
Oh, man. You shouldn't have done that.
Frank, go around Mike.
- Duck, Billy! -
Michael.
Michael.
Get those fuckers, Billy.
Get 'em.
Call 911, get an ambulance.
- Now! - Yeah, sure.
Hey, get off my car, you scumbag!
translation.ja: 邪魔だ　どこ見てる？

translation.en: - Freeze! - What the hell?
You got five seconds to get off that fucking boat.
Move!
Undo that line.
Come on, we got you.
l need your fastest boat.
Who the hell are you?
Police, give me the keys.
Get the hell out of here, what are you doing?
Give me the fucking keys.
- Where's the boat? - Manhattan Express, right over there.
translation.ja: どれだ？ あそこにある

translation.en: Hold it!
Get the hell out of that thing. The Harbor Police will get him.
translation.ja: 行くな　水上警察に任せろ

translation.en: He killed Michael, Captain.
- Billy, I'm ordering you! -
Damn! Fucking Chinaman don't give up!
Aviation 0- 5- Zebra. Officer 1412 in pursuit of a suspect.
translation.ja: 05Ｚ号機 こちら1412 ボートで容疑者を追跡中

translation.en: I'm in the blue- white speedboat below you. Can you come up over me?
translation.ja: 降下して 引き上げてくれないか

translation.en: Roger, 1412. New York control, this is 0- 5- Zebra in pursuit.
translation.ja: 了解 こちら05Ｚ号 方向転換し 接近準備します

translation.en: We're turning south at the Brooklyn Bridge, heading down the river.
translation.ja: こちら05Ｚ号 方向転換し 接近準備します

translation.en: That guy is crazy.
Come in closer and drop me a line.
On the count of three, pull me up as fast as you can.
translation.ja: 最接近して 合図で 素早く引き上げてくれ

translation.en: One, two, three!
Motherfucker!
Is Daddy coming back soon?
translation.ja: パパ すぐ帰ってくる？

translation.en: You deliberately disobeyed a direct order!
translation.ja: なぜ 私の命令に 従わなかった

translation.en: That man killed my partner.
That's no excuse for blowing up half the goddamn harbor!
translation.ja: だからと言って 爆破していいのか？

translation.en: - Captain, listen. - You listen to me, Wong!
translation.ja: ですが… 黙れ　ウォン

translation.en: I don't like it any more than you do when a cop gets killed. But we're not in the revenge business.
translation.ja: 感情的になるな 明らかに行きすぎだ

translation.en: The Mayor's been up the commissioner's ass over this one, Wong. He wants your fucking shield! And if he can't get it, he'll take mine!
translation.ja: 市長が怒ってお前か私を クビにしろと言ってる

translation.en: l had no choice, Captain.
You could have stood by and let the Harbor Police pick that guy up. But, no, gotta be a big hero.
translation.ja: 水上警察の管轄に乗り込み ヒーローを気取りやがって

translation.en: Billy Wong, Super Cop. This is it, Billy. You're back to crowd control.
translation.ja: しばらく現場から離れて 交通整理に従事してもらう

translation.en: - But, Captain-- - No fucking buts!
translation.ja: そんな… もう決まったことだ 文句は言うな

translation.en: That's final!
translation.ja: もう決まったことだ 文句は言うな

translation.en: Maybe next time you'll think twice before you pull one of your hot dog stunts.
translation.ja: 今後は慎重に 行動することだな

translation.en: Now get out of here!
Nice suit, Garoni.
Billy, you like it, huh? I'm supposed to blend in with the crowd.
translation.ja: いつもの服じゃ 浮いちまうだろ

translation.en: I heard about your fireworks display in the harbor. You always did have a flair for the dramatic, Billy boy.
translation.ja: お前 また派手に やらかしたそうだな

translation.en: How did you get this shit detail?
The usual. Some punk pulled a knife on me so I kicked his fucking teeth in.
translation.ja: 知らない奴なんかいるかよ

translation.en: And he screamed, Police brutality!
All the way to the commissioner's office. The usual bullshit.
translation.ja: 上官の耳に 届かないはずはないな

translation.en: The usual bullshit.
You know, if somebody dropped a bomb in here, they'd wipe out half the junior diplomats in New York.
translation.ja: 俺も暴力沙汰で 運悪く警備に回された

translation.en: That's why we're here.
- Terrific, I'm glad you made it. - That's Laura Shapiro.
- It's lovely to see you. - Oh, I'd like to work undercover with her.
translation.ja: 覆面捜査も いいもんだ

translation.en: No, don't tell me. You guys are cops?
translation.ja: あなたたち 刑事さんでしょ

translation.en: We're that obvious?
You're not so bad, but, uh, that friend of yours, he sticks out like a sore thumb.
translation.ja: あなたはマシだけど そちらは いかにもって感じよ

translation.en: Look, uh, you guys allowed to drink? Can I get you a beer or something?
translation.ja: 仕事中だけど １杯くらい いいでしょう？

translation.en: No, thanks. Tell you what.
translation.ja: いや 結構 仕事のあとに 一緒に飲まないか？

translation.en: If you wait until I go off duty, I'll buy you a drink.
translation.ja: 仕事のあとに 一緒に飲まないか？

translation.en: Oh, yeah? l just might take you up on that.
translation.ja: ええ　悪くないわね

translation.en: Um, excuse me, gentlemen. I have to mingle.
translation.ja: ちょっと失礼 挨拶に行かなきゃ

translation.en: That bum, Shapiro, probably uses his own daughter to launder money.
translation.ja: 新進デザイナーの ローラ･シャピーロだ

translation.en: Listen, you lousy Chink bastard, you keep bugging Mr. Shapiro's daughter,
translation.ja: お嬢さんに手を出したら ただじゃ済まないから 覚えておけ

translation.en: they'll scrape you off the floor with a putty knife.
translation.ja: ただじゃ済まないから 覚えておけ

translation.en: His name's Benny Garucci. He's an ex- karate champ. I would like to bust his fucking head open with a crowbar.
translation.ja: 彼は元空手チャンピオンの ベニー･ガルーチ

translation.en: But you're gonna have to hold him. He's a tough son of a bitch.
translation.ja: 敵に回したくない相手だ

translation.en: I wonder why Shapiro needs that kind of muscle here?
translation.ja: なぜ用心棒が ここに？

translation.en: Are you kidding? He can afford to have the whole fucking Marine Corps standing by to protect him if he wanted to.
translation.ja: ローラの父親が 雇ったに決まってるだろ

translation.en: That fuck owns half of Manhattan, Billy.
translation.ja: この辺りを牛耳る男だ

translation.en: l wouldn't mind teaching Garucci a little lesson in manners someday.
translation.ja: それほど 警戒する必要もないさ

translation.en: Ladies and gentlemen,
Laura Shapiro Marketing is very pleased to introduce to New York City
translation.ja: 今回 ローラ･シャピーロが 皆さんにご紹介するのは⸺

translation.en: the sensational Edmond Wong
translation.ja: 今回 ローラ･シャピーロが 皆さんにご紹介するのは⸺ エドモンド･ウォンの 最新コレクションです

translation.en: and his fabulous collection of shimmering cocktail wear.
translation.ja: エドモンド･ウォンの 最新コレクションです どうぞお楽しみください

translation.en: Nice dress.
Nice tits.
The whole warehouse!
New York's finest.
translation.ja: 一体 何をやってた？

translation.en: Can't even keep a girl from being snatched right out from under your goddamn noses.
translation.ja: 一体 何をやってた？ 役立たずめ

translation.en: We had our guns out.
You could've had your dicks out for all the good it did.
If I take my dick out, I'm gonna use it, Captain.
We couldn't shoot without hitting the girl.
translation.ja: 大勢 犠牲者が出る

translation.en: I think you two men did the right thing.
Well, thank you, sir. Any word from Shapiro?
He has no idea why his daughter was snatched.
translation.ja: 誘拐の原因に 心当たりはないらしい

translation.en: We've been monitoring his phone for the past 12 hours.
translation.ja: 彼の通話を 12時間チェックしたが

translation.en: No ransom demands, no orders, nothing.
translation.ja: 身代金を要求する連絡は 一切ない

translation.en: You might find this interesting.
What is it?
A record of all the phone calls made in the last 12 hours by Shapiro's hood, Benny Garucci.
translation.ja: 用心棒のガルーチの 事件前12時間の通話記録です

translation.en: Six calls all to the same number.
Country code 8- 5- 2.
- Hong Kong. - How the hell did you get this?
A friend of mine at the phone company.
- The blonde? - No, the redhead.
translation.ja: 金髪女か 赤毛だよ

translation.en: What the hell does all this got to do with Hong Kong?
There's somebody waiting outside who might just be able to answer that.
translation.ja: 答えが分かる人物を 呼んである

translation.en: Send in Mr. Cantrell, please.
Men, this is Bob Cantrell from the Justice Department.
translation.ja: 司法省から来た ボブ･カントレル氏だ

translation.en: Are these the men who kidnapped Laura Shapiro?
Now, how the fuck should we know? They were wearing masks. Excuse me, lady.
translation.ja: 悪いが無駄足だ 奴らは覆面をしてた

translation.en: What's this all about?
These men all work for a powerful Hong Kong crime boss named Harold Ko.
translation.ja: 香港の犯罪王 ハロルド･コーの手下だ

translation.en: Harold Ko.
What, do you know him?
Anybody who knows Hong Kong knows Ko.
translation.ja: 香港で知らない者はない

translation.en: A real snake.
Yeah, and a tough one to catch.
Now, we've suspected Shapiro and Ko
translation.ja: 恐らく シャピーロとコーは

translation.en: of running drugs from Hong Kong to New York for years, but we've never been able to pin anything on him.
translation.ja: 麻薬取引に関与してる

translation.en: Why the hell would Ko wanna snatch Shapiro's daughter?
We don't know, maybe they've had a falling out of some kind. Whatever the reason,
translation.ja: 理由は分からんが これだけは言える

translation.en: there's a good possibility that Laura Shapiro is now being held in Hong Kong.
translation.ja: ローラが 香港にいる可能性は高い

translation.en: That's impossible.
Nobody could smuggle a girl into Hong Kong that quickly.
translation.ja: どうやって 国外に連れ去る？

translation.en: - It's impossible. - Not for Ko.
translation.ja: どうやって 国外に連れ去る？ 奴なら可能だ

translation.en: He's right. Ko's got most of the island in his back pocket.
translation.ja: あの男は 何だってやるからな

translation.en: Sir, if Laura Shapiro's in Hong Kong we should check it out.
translation.ja: 香港へ行って捜します

translation.en: Forget it, Wong.
My Chinatown contacts can give me the names of some good informers over there. It might be worth our try.
translation.ja: 自分は香港に詳しいので 捜査に適任だと思います

translation.en: Garoni could come with me. He knows Hong Kong from his Vietnam days.
translation.ja: ガローニも土地勘がある

translation.en: You're way out of line, Wong.
l like it.
If you men could find Laura Shapiro and pin it on Ko,
translation.ja: ローラを見つけて コーを挙げれば

translation.en: you might just be able to shut off the largest heroin pipeline to ever come out of the Orient.
translation.ja: 香港とＮ.Ｙ.の ２大シンジケートをつぶせる

translation.en: Okay, we got nothing to lose.
Why don't you two men go to Hong Kong as special advisors to the local police
translation.ja: 香港警察の特別捜査官として 現地入りしてくれ

translation.en: and see what you can come up with.
Yes, sir.
See you, Captain.
Thank you, Captain.
Thank you.
Here's the keys to that jeep you asked for.
Oh, thank you.
- You sure you don't want a driver? - No, we're okay.
Thanks for getting this through customs for us, Inspector. We really appreciate it.
Superintendent Whitehead will meet you tomorrow afternoon at four.
translation.ja: ホワイトヘンド署長の所へ…

translation.en: - You got it, Billy? - Oh, yeah, thanks. See you tomorrow.
Sleep well.
Man, you love it, huh?
We could stay at a better place, you know? We're on an expense account.
translation.ja: もっといい宿もあるが 経費の節約さ

translation.en: Nostalgia, Billy, my boy. Nostalgia. Memories of magic nights on R & R.
translation.ja: この懐かしい雰囲気が いいじゃないか

translation.en: I remember during Nam, there was nothing around here but a bunch of horny grunts, you know?
translation.ja: ベトナム戦争中の 若かりし頃を思い出すよ

translation.en: And the women, Billy.
Oh, the women, mother me.
translation.ja: 昔は無茶をしたもんさ

translation.en: And besides, nobody's gonna look for us in a dump like this.
translation.ja: でも ここじゃ 連れ込めないな

translation.en: What's that?
An old Chinese coin. A friend of mine in Chinatown gave this to me.
translation.ja: 友達からもらった 古いコインだよ

translation.en: It's sort of a calling card.
- Oh yeah? - Yeah.
Looks like a bunch of shit to me.
I still say it's ludicrous.
The idea that anyone could smuggle a girl into Hong Kong without my office knowing about it is simply impossible.
translation.ja: 香港で密入国者を 特定するのは極めて難しい

translation.en: Improbable, not impossible.
Now, listen to me, you two.
I spoke to your captain and he told me about your Dodge City tactics.
translation.ja: アメリカでは 派手にやってたそうだが

translation.en: We don't appreciate people like you in Hong Kong.
l want you to assure me that you'll behave with the utmost discretion.
translation.ja: 分別ある態度で 任務に臨んでくれ

translation.en: Discretion is my middle name, sir.
translation.ja: 分かってます ご心配には及びません

translation.en: Show them out, Inspector.
Yes, sir.
Thank you, sir.
Gentlemen, you must forgive the superintendent.
translation.ja: 署長の態度をお許しください

translation.en: He's been trying to nab Ko for years. Considers it a personal mission in life.
translation.ja: 長年 コーを追っていますが 失踪者は後を絶ちません

translation.en: I think he's worried you will succeed where he has failed all these years.
translation.ja: お二人に先を 越されたくないんです

translation.en: Don't worry about it, Inspector. I'm used to pissing off superiors.
translation.ja: 上官なんて 皆 そんなもんさ

translation.en: We ran down the phone number you gave us.
Shanghai Massage Parlor.
That's where Benny Garucci called from New York.
translation.ja: ガルーチの通話相手か

translation.en: Apparently, it's a rough place.
They, uh, don't necessarily specialize in giving massages, if you know what l mean.
translation.ja: マッサージ以外の サービスもやってますから

translation.en: You bet your ass I do.
Let's check this place out. Maybe we can shake Ko's tree a little.
translation.ja: あとで行って調べてみよう

translation.en: Billy, you're a mind reader.
You two be careful.
One of the reasons Ko has managed to stay out of prison for so long
translation.ja: 長年 捜査の手を 逃れている男です

translation.en: is he doesn't mind killing anyone who threatens him.
translation.ja: 容赦なく汚い手を使う

translation.en: If he thinks you're getting too close to finding Laura Shapiro,
your names will be on the lips of every assassin in Hong Kong.
It's a friendly little town you got here, Inspector.
Welcome to Hong Kong.
This is my favorite part of town, Billy.
We're supposed to be working here.
You know what they say, All work, no play.
Play around here can get us killed.
At least you'd die with a smile on your face.
Welcome, gentlemen. First time here?
We're just a couple of poor lost souls from New York.
A good friend of ours recommended this place very highly.
translation.ja: この店を友人に勧められてね

translation.en: We have many friends in New York.
Maybe you remember our friend. His name's Benny Garucci.
translation.ja: ベニー･ガルーチを知ってる？

translation.en: Yeah, Benny Garucci. Benny Garucci, he really loves this place.
He talks about it all the time. - Right, Billy? - Right.
translation.ja: お気に入りらしくてね

translation.en: So sorry, we... we have so many friends. I can't remember them all.
translation.ja: 海外のお客様が多いので 覚えていません

translation.en: But I'm sure we can make your visit here very exciting.
translation.ja: とにかく たっぷり サービスしますよ

translation.en: Follow, please.
Keep your eyes open.
Don't worry, Billy boy. l wouldn't miss this for the world.
translation.ja: 大丈夫だ　任せとけって

translation.en: Billy, don't let this guy sneak up on me.
Hey, Garoni?
I'm gonna get you.
You know, you're very pretty.
My goodness gracious. What do we got here?
Billy.
Billy, look at this, huh?
Whichever one you want is yours, Billy, huh?
- Okay, hello. - You made the wrong choice. That's... I'm in love, this is mine.
translation.ja: おい やめとけ そっちは俺だよ

translation.en: I'm your friend, you gotta take care of your friends, don't you?
Excuse me.
l remember these holes when they were a little smaller, you know?
translation.ja: この穴が何とも意味深だ

translation.en: What do we got here?
Welcome to.
Welcome to.
This chick loves me.
You love my clothes?
I love your clothes.
Oh! You remind me of someone I knew in Saigon.
translation.ja: サービスがいいな ゾクゾクしてきた

translation.en: Oh, you know Saigon.
You're very beautiful, really.
No, you are.
How old are you? Eighteen?
You guess.
She really knows a way to a man's heart.
When did you grow a beard?
What the hell?
Shit!
Oh! Damn it!
You punk!
Drop it, motherfucker!
No, you drop it.
Motherfucker.
Oh, shit, what the fuck is going on here, huh?
Dress them and take them to my office.
translation.ja: 服を着て部屋に来い 話がある

translation.en: l wanna talk to them before we kill them.
translation.ja: 服を着て部屋に来い 話がある 覚悟しろよ

translation.en: A guy can't take a bath in peace?
translation.ja: 風呂にも入ってられん

translation.en: Why did Shapiro send you?
Shapiro?
- Hey, wait a minute. - l think you know why he sent us.
translation.ja: 俺たちは… 来た理由は分かるな

translation.en: Oh, Shapiro? Oh, sure, he's very angry at you people, very angry.
translation.ja: シャピーロが カンカンに怒ってるぞ

translation.en: Shapiro's angry at us?
That's right, yeah.
But he's the one who--
Don't say anything! These men are New York cop.
translation.ja: こいつら Ｎ.Ｙ.のサツです

translation.en: - Cops? - Cops?
l am not a cop, I'm a tourist.
- Maybe he's a cop. You a cop? - Do I look like a cop?
translation.ja: これでサツに見えるか

translation.en: He doesn't look like a cop.
Take 'em out. Kill 'em.
translation.ja: 話は終わりだ　殺せ

translation.en: Tell Harold Ko we're in town. His days are numbered.
translation.ja: 俺たちが香港に来たと コーに伝えろ

translation.en: It's never wise to make threats, my young friend.
translation.ja: 利口なやり方じゃない

translation.en: Especially, ones you can't keep.
That's not a threat. That's a promise.
translation.ja: 脅しじゃない　逮捕の予告だ

translation.en: Let's go.
Whatever you say, partner.
Well, you're calling the shots, Billy. What do we do next, huh?
translation.ja: タンカは切ったが どうする気だ？

translation.en: Here.
What is it with this coin?
Tomorrow we're going to cash this in.
translation.ja: 明日 リー･ヒンに会う

translation.en: If we use it right, it may tell us everything we want to know about Mr. Ko.
translation.ja: このコインが 活躍してくれるぞ

translation.en: This Lee Hing, is he an informer?
translation.ja: リー･ヒンは どこに？

translation.en: He used to be.
translation.ja: 奴は もう引退した

translation.en: He's retired, but he's still tapped into the whole Hong Kong underworld.
translation.ja: 奴は もう引退した 今は船上で商売をしてる

translation.en: Well, what makes you think he'll help us?
translation.ja: その男が知ってるのか

translation.en: He may not, but do you have anything better to do today?
translation.ja: 確信はないが当たってみる

translation.en: Well, as a matter of fact, l could probably think of something.
translation.ja: 手当たり次第ってわけか リー･ヒンの船へ

translation.en: What happened to your eye?
It's swollen, l think something bit me.
You better watch out for Hong Kong mosquito wearing high heels.
translation.ja: 香港の蚊は ハイヒールで刺すからな

translation.en: Hey, that's the Jumbo Restaurant! Boy, do I remember that.
translation.ja: こりゃすごい 水の上に店が並んでる

translation.en: But I don't remember the rest of this new shit.
It all looks kind of different to me, Billy.
There's Lee Hing's boat.
Looks like our friend's doing okay.
I bring you greetings from a friend in New York.
Who is your friend?
His name is Tin Ho.
Tin Ho is a very old and honorable friend.
translation.ja: 彼は古くからの友人だ

translation.en: - Now, Mr. Hing, look, we've just come-- - You are police officers from New York.
translation.ja: 実は我々は… Ｎ.Ｙ.の刑事だろ

translation.en: You have come here looking for a girl who was kidnapped by Ko.
translation.ja: コーが誘拐した娘を捜してる

translation.en: Gentlemen, there are no secrets in Hong Kong.
translation.ja: 香港は噂が広まるのが早い

translation.en: Come, sit and have some tea with me.
translation.ja: 茶でも飲んでいってくれ

translation.en: It's the least I can do. Seeing as how you have come all the way to see me for nothing.
translation.ja: 遠くから来たのに 無駄足を踏んだのだからな

translation.en: Soo Ling, chá for our guests.
translation.ja: スーリン　茶を出してくれ

translation.en: Why is our trip for nothing? Surely, you can help us.
translation.ja: あなたは 何か知ってるはずです

translation.en: Surely, l could. But I will not.
translation.ja: 知っていても協力できん

translation.en: My father's retired.
Ahoy, Uncle Hing.
I've got a charter in a few hours. Can I hit you for some supplies?
translation.ja: ガソリンを拝借するよ

translation.en: On credit, I suppose.
At least I'm consistent.
Mr. Hing. If you know anything about where Ko is keeping this girl, you gotta tell us.
translation.ja: コーに誘拐された娘の 居所を教えてくれ

translation.en: My daughter was quite correct. l am retired.
translation.ja: 娘が言ったとおり 私は もう引退したんだ

translation.en: But a man like you must maintain his contacts. Could you have them find out for us?
translation.ja: コーに恨みがあるんだろ 復讐したくないのか

translation.en: Gentlemen, dealing in information like that is extremely dangerous.
translation.ja: 今さら 危険なことに 首を突っ込みたくない

translation.en: Especially, when it involves people like Harold Ko.
translation.ja: 特にコーと関わるのは ご免だ

translation.en: Listen, if there's something you're not telling us, we can take you in and let the local cops deal with you.
translation.ja: 言わないなら 一緒に警察に来てもらう

translation.en: Are these men bothering you, sir?
That is not necessary, Stan.
translation.ja: いいんだ　ダニエル

translation.en: These gentlemen are simply tired and frustrated.
translation.ja: 長旅で疲れて イラついてるだけだ

translation.en: Forgive them.
They are dangerous, Father. Make them leave before they bring trouble.
translation.ja: 面倒なことになる前に 追い返して

translation.en: Don't look now, but I think they already have.
translation.ja: 少し遅かったみたいだ

translation.en: Damn it, they must have followed us, Billy.
No.
You're gonna take me to Ko right now, asshole.
translation.ja: コーの所へ連れていけ

translation.en: Shit!
You see? You see the trouble you cause? Why wouldn't you leave us alone?
translation.ja: 危険なことに 巻き込まないで

translation.en: Hey, give me a break.
Tin Ho has asked a favor of me. l must honor it.
translation.ja: こんな状況じゃ仕方ない 力になろう

translation.en: Do you think that's wise, Uncle?
Maybe not. But sometimes honor is not wise.
translation.ja: 友の望みとあらば 期待に応えてもよかろう

translation.en: Can you tell me where Ko's holding Laura Shapiro?
Not yet, but my friends will know.
translation.ja: 知り合いに聞いてみよう

translation.en: Uh... Do you have a picture of the girl?
translation.ja: その娘の写真はあるか

translation.en: Right here.
Come back here tomorrow. Stan will know where to find me.
translation.ja: 明日 ここへ来い ダニエルが案内する

translation.en: Well, thanks, we really appreciate it.
Thanks.
What the fuck is this?
Who's this?
I hope we can say I'm a friend.
translation.ja: 名前なんてどうでもいい

translation.en: Listen, you creep.
It's not your money we want, it's your ass.
translation.ja: 俺たちが 金で動くと思うなよ

translation.en: I'm sorry to hear that. Goodbye, Mr. Wong.
translation.ja: そいつは残念だな あばよ　ウォン

translation.en: - Danny. -
Holy shit, Garoni!
Get the window, Billy, I got downstairs.
You fools failed.
Sit down.
l spoke to your captain again.
He assured me that a machine gun is most definitely not standard issue to New York City police.
translation.ja: マシンガンはＮ.Ｙ.でも 使わないそうじゃないか

translation.en: I never go anywhere in Southeast Asia without an Uzi.
translation.ja: マシンガンなしじゃ 生き残れない

translation.en: Do you know what this is? This is an initial estimate of the damage you caused.
translation.ja: 破損物の修繕費用の 見積書だ

translation.en: Look, at least we know we're getting close to Ko. Otherwise, he wouldn't have tried to wipe us out like that.
translation.ja: コーに狙われたのは 奴らを追いつめてるからだ

translation.en: Oh, you have evidence that Ko is behind the attack? Jolly good, let's see it then.
translation.ja: コーの仕業だという 証拠でもあるのか

translation.en: I think it's obvious, don't you?
You want to know what kind of reputation Harold Ko has in Hong Kong?
translation.ja: コーの評判を知ってるか

translation.en: Read that!
He spent three million American dollars to purchase that horse.
And he's holding a press conference this afternoon to announce that all its race winnings will be donated to the Colony's Orphan Fund.
translation.ja: レースの賞金を全額 寄付すると発表した

translation.en: He's a real fucking peach.
I'm warning you two.
I've already wired your commissioner to ask him to take you off this case.
translation.ja: 今回の寛大な処置は 特別だと思え

translation.en: If I have to set eyes on you again, there'll be bloody hell to pay!
translation.ja: 今度やったら ブチ込むぞ

translation.en: - Can we go now? - Get the hell out of here!
translation.ja: 行っても？ 出ていけ

translation.en: This Whitehead's a real schmuck. So, what are we gonna do next, Billy?
translation.ja: やれやれだな このあとは どうする？

translation.en: There's still Lee Hing. Let's hope he comes up with something.
translation.ja: とにかく奴のシッポを つかまないとな

translation.en: ln the meantime, do you like horses?
I love horses.
Ladies and gentlemen, as you all know, Stolen Fortune,
translation.ja: 皆さんも ご存じだと思いますが 名馬ストールン･ フォーチュンは⸺

translation.en: the most successful horse of all time,
translation.ja: 名馬ストールン･ フォーチュンは⸺

translation.en: sired only one son before he was killed in a tragic fire.
translation.ja: 火事に遭って死ぬ前に 息子を残しました

translation.en: The son, Breakaway Threat, was the horse they said no one could buy.
translation.ja: そのサラブレッドは誰も 買えまいと言われましたが

translation.en: They were wrong.
Thank you.
It's my pleasure to present my latest acquisition...
translation.ja: そのブレイクアウェイ･ スレットを紹介します

translation.en: Breakaway Threat, to the people of Hong Kong.
translation.ja: そのブレイクアウェイ･ スレットを紹介します どうぞ ご覧ください

translation.en: Mr. Ko, how much money do you think Breakaway Threat will be able to earn for the Orphan Fund?
translation.ja: どのくらいのお金を 寄付される予定ですか？

translation.en: We hope to donate almost two million dollars
translation.ja: 確実に200万ドルには なるでしょうか

translation.en: by the end of the next racing season.
translation.ja: レースの獲得賞金の ほぼ全額ですね

translation.en: Mr. Ko, how soon will Breakaway Threat be able to race?
translation.ja: コーさん 初レースは いつですか

translation.en: Breakaway Threat will be running one week from Saturday.
translation.ja: 土曜日から１週間 レースに出ます

translation.en: Hey, Ko.
You left your briefcase in our hotel room.
translation.ja: 忘れたカバンを届けにきた

translation.en: I think you are mistaken, sir.
Well, if this isn't your briefcase,
then this isn't your money either.
I don't think this guy Ko likes you, Billy.
translation.ja: あれだけで いいのか？

translation.en: That's too bad.
Are you surprised to see Garucci here?
Not really. Right now, we have more important business to take care of. You follow Garucci. I'll go see what Lee Hing's dug up.
translation.ja: お前はガルーチを追え 俺はダニエルの所へ行く

translation.en: Whatever you say, kid.
If your father can help us, we can shut down one of the worst criminals in the world.
translation.ja: 君のお父さんの 協力さえ得られれば

translation.en: There's no dishonor in that.
Everything will be fine, you'll see.
Cove ahead.
Oh, shit.
No!
Father!
Father!
No!
Too late now.
Billy, for Christ's sake, keep her back! Soo Ling!
translation.ja: よせ　スーリン 見るんじゃない

translation.en: You. You're the cause of this.
translation.ja: 全部 あなたのせいよ

translation.en: You killed my father!
No, l didn't kill your father. Harold Ko killed your father.
translation.ja: 違う　殺したのはコーだ

translation.en: I hate you! I hate you!
If you hate me, then you must hate Ko. Help me find him.
translation.ja: コーを捜すのを手伝ってくれ

translation.en: Help me destroy the man who killed your father.
Father!
My father told me to help you.
Even though he's dead, I must obey.
translation.ja: 父が信頼してた人を 紹介するわ

translation.en: The fortune- teller was a friend of my father's.
translation.ja: 占い師をやってる友人よ

translation.en: If my father found out anything, the fortune- teller will know.
translation.ja: 彼なら何か知ってると 父が言ってた

translation.en: You look for a girl that was taken from New York by Mr. Ko.
translation.ja: Ｎ.Ｙ.で誘拐された娘を 捜してるね

translation.en: How do you know?
The I Ching tells all.
Nothing is hidden. There has been war.
translation.ja: あなたは事件をかぎ回り リー･ヒンは殺された

translation.en: Between Ko and Shapiro?
Yes, but the war is over.
translation.ja: ああ 川向こうの研究所で 麻薬が作られている

translation.en: A man has come across the water to make peace.
translation.ja: 川向こうの研究所で 麻薬が作られている

translation.en: Benny Garucci.
Yes.
My people tell me a pact will be made tomorrow night.
translation.ja: 明日の夜 梱包して 船積みされるらしい

translation.en: And the girl will be returned.
translation.ja: 誘拐された娘も見つかる

translation.en: Where's the girl?
I do not know.
But you must not look for her.
translation.ja: だが十分 気をつけなさい

translation.en: The I Ching is not good.
translation.ja: リー･ヒンの 二の舞いになる

translation.en: I see only danger...
translation.ja: あなたにも 危険が迫っている

translation.en: death, and betrayal.
translation.ja: 裏切り者に注意しなさい

translation.en: Thanks.
Wait a minute.
l must say a prayer for my father and consult the I Ching.
translation.ja: 父のために祈って 裏切り者を見つける

translation.en: What do your sticks say? Is the fortune- teller right?
I ask the questions, Billy. But I never read the answers.
translation.ja: あなたよりは信用できるわ

translation.en: l trust you found the girl, well?
Yes, sir, just as you promised.
translation.ja: ええ　指示どおりの場所で

translation.en: When Mr. Shapiro refused to pay for my last shipment, l lost much face.
translation.ja: シャピーロに取引を拒まれ 私は面目を失った

translation.en: l trust it will never happen again.
translation.ja: 早く名誉を 回復したいものだ

translation.en: It was a simple misunderstanding, sir.
translation.ja: あれは単なる手違いです

translation.en: Be assured that Mr. Shapiro remains your faithful friend and partner.
translation.ja: シャピーロは 取引に応じました

translation.en: He wishes no ill feeling towards you.
I'm glad to hear this.
But Mr. Shapiro is worried.
Those two cops from New York, they're getting too close to our operation.
translation.ja: Ｎ.Ｙ.のサツの 邪魔が入ることです

translation.en: Calm your fears. The girl should be returned to you tonight.
translation.ja: シャピーロの娘は 今夜 お前に返す

translation.en: As for those two police officers, they cause me great dishonor.
translation.ja: あの２人のサツには 大いに恥をかかされた

translation.en: They will be taken care of.
Garucci went to this big container shipyard before he went to see Ko.
translation.ja: ガルーチはコーを訪ねる前に 造船所へ行った

translation.en: Now, it's my guess he was checking on the girl before arranging an exchange with the big man.
translation.ja: コーに会う前に娘の安否を 確かめたに違いない

translation.en: The fortune- teller said the exchange will be made tonight.
translation.ja: 占い師が “取引は今夜だ”って

translation.en: So, we have to break in and get the girl out before that can happen.
translation.ja: その前にローラを助けないと

translation.en: Tall order, man. The rumors I hear say the place is Ko's drug factory.
translation.ja: あそこには 麻薬工場があるらしいぞ

translation.en: It will be heavily guarded.
Maybe we should call Whitehead, Billy.
Hold it. We're not sure it's the drug factory.
We're not sure Laura Shapiro's there. If we're wrong, Whitehead will ship us home.
translation.ja: もし事実と違ったら 今度こそ送還されるぞ

translation.en: l will go with you.
That's a great idea.
l can handle myself in a fight.
We know you can, Soo Ling.
But someone has to stay behind just in case we're caught. That's your job.
translation.ja: 君の役目は ここで待ってることだ

translation.en: He's right, honey. Now, if you don't hear from us three hours after we hit the place,
translation.ja: ３時間たっても 俺たちから連絡がなければ⸺

translation.en: you call Whitehead, understand? Call.
Don't worry, Soo Ling, I'll go with them.
You have experience in this kind of things?
Yeah, you might say that. Seals, US Navy.
translation.ja: 海軍の特殊部隊に いたからね

translation.en: As a matter of fact, I just happen to have some of my old gear with me.
translation.ja: 実は いい物を持ってるんだ

translation.en: It might just come in handy.
What the fuck is that?
I got that from an Israeli friend of mine.
That's a portable, six- shot, 20- millimeter cannon.
I'll be a son of a bitch.
I ain't never seen anything like that.
translation.ja: そんなの見たことない

translation.en: - Have you, Billy? - No.
The entrance is about four containers in. It's a gray door.
translation.ja: 入り口はグレーのドアだ

translation.en: About four containers on top of that there's an air duct connected to an air conditioner. That's how we go in.
translation.ja: コンテナの上の通気口から 入れるはず

translation.en: - All right? - All right.
- Let's do it. - Okay.
Okay, all signed out.
You wait here. I'll bring down Laura Shapiro.
translation.ja: ここで待て　娘は無事だ

translation.en: She better be all right.
I'll go first.
I'll be right behind you, Billy boy. You got my back, Jones?
- I got it. - All right, let's go.
Okay.
Drop your guns.
Billy!
Billy!
I told you the Japanese make great bulletproof vests.
translation.ja: 日本製の防弾チョッキは 素晴らしい

translation.en: Let's get those fuckers!
Everybody out! Come on, move out of this joint, let' s go!
translation.ja: 出ろ　爆弾を仕掛けたぞ

translation.en: - - Am I talking to myself here? Go!
translation.ja: 早く出ろ 頭がフッ飛ぶぞ

translation.en: - Come on, let's go! - Let's move! Let's go!
translation.ja: 早く出ろ 頭がフッ飛ぶぞ 急げ

translation.en: Hold it!
- or I'll blow your dick off! - Key, key! Come on!
translation.ja: キーを キーを寄こせ

translation.en: Key! Key!
What's the matter, you never seen four naked broads before? Let's go!
translation.ja: 素っ裸で何してる？ 早く出ろ

translation.en: - Good to see you again, Laura. - Yeah. Hell of a way to get a date.
That's very funny.
- What the fuck's going on? - They're gonna blow the lab up.
translation.ja: 何事だ？ 爆破されるわ

translation.en: - You got it, almost ready? - Yeah.
Come on, kid, let's go, we're on a count!
- Yeah, I'm ready. - Let's go!
- With me? - Yes, sir.
This sucker's got keys. Come on, let's roll it.
Where's Laura Shapiro?
The man asked you a question.
Fuck you.
Surely, you know we can make you talk.
translation.ja: 力ずくでも口を割らせるぞ

translation.en: l got news for you Ko.
You're finished, you're already dead and you don't know it yet.
translation.ja: お前らは終わりってことだ

translation.en: This is all so unnecessary.
Enjoy yourself, Benny.
Hello?
This is Billy Wong. You've got a problem, Ko.
I've got a problem?
If you don't give me Garoni, I'm not releasing Laura Shapiro to anyone.
translation.ja: ガローニを殺したら ローラは渡さないぞ

translation.en: If you kill Garoni, she disappears.
translation.ja: ローラには消えてもらう

translation.en: I'm surprised.
l had no idea your partner's life meant so much to you.
translation.ja: お前がそんなに 相棒思いだったとは

translation.en: I believe we can do business, Mr. Wong.
Shall we say, in my shipping yard? In two hours.
translation.ja: ２時間後に 私の造船所へ来い

translation.en: I'll be there.
Stan will take you to Whitehead. He will get you home.
translation.ja: 署長が家へ帰してくれる

translation.en: Look, I don't mind staying in hiding until you can get Garoni back.
translation.ja: 刑事さんが戻るまで待つわ

translation.en: That's okay.
Get Laura to Whitehead.
Tell him to have as many men as possible at Ko's shipyard at exactly 7:00 a.m.
translation.ja: コーの造船所に 応援を寄こすよう言ってくれ

translation.en: If he's late, there's gonna be lots of dead bodies to pick up.
translation.ja: ７時きっかりだ 遅れたら死人が出る

translation.en: You're not going in there alone, are you?
Yeah, this is between me, Benny Garucci, and Harold Ko.
translation.ja: コーとガルーチ そして俺の取引だからな

translation.en: Mr. Wong.
How nice to see you.
Where's Garoni?
Where's Laura Shapiro?
My partner first.
But, of course.
You bastard.
I've lived up to my part of the bargain, Mr. Wong.
Now, where is the girl?
translation.ja: ローラは どうした

translation.en: She's safe.
She certainly is.
Whitehead.
l warned you, Wong. Mr. Ko is a very influential man in Hong Kong.
translation.ja: コーは香港の有力者だと 君にも言ったはずだぞ

translation.en: You son of a bitch.
Oh, yes, but a well- paid one.
translation.ja: 何とでも言え 金の誘惑には勝てん

translation.en: Well, it seems that this affair will come to a happy ending after all.
translation.ja: ハッピーエンドで カタがついたようだな

translation.en: There only remains one last piece of entertainment.
translation.ja: 最後に もう１つ 余興を楽しむとするか

translation.en: Come on, big boy.
You son of a bitch!
Soo Ling, you help Laura, I'll take care of Garoni.
Going somewhere, Superintendent?
Start the engine. Start the engine.
Go! Stop him. Stop him!
Get me out of here.
No.
Run him down!
Shit.
Jesus Christ.
Give me that fucking thing.
Give it to me, come on.
In recognition of service above and beyond the call of duty,
translation.ja: 勇敢に凶悪犯に立ち向かった 刑事の活躍で⸺

translation.en: which resulted in the forfeiture of over 2,000 pounds of illicit drugs en route from Hong Kong to New York,
translation.ja: ２大都市の麻薬密売組織の 摘発に成功しました

translation.en: the Police Department of the City of New York
translation.ja: その功績をたたえ ニューヨーク市警から⸺

translation.en: is proud to bestow it's departmental Medal of Honor
translation.ja: その功績をたたえ ニューヨーク市警から⸺ ウォン刑事とガローニ刑事に 勲章を授与します

translation.en: on officers Wong and Garoni.
translation.ja: ウォン刑事とガローニ刑事に 勲章を授与します

translation.en: Thanks, Captain. It's good to be home.
What's our next assignment, Cap?
Crowd control.
Congratulations.
- Well done, Garoni. - Thank you, sir.
